properties.name: A truly great cemetary
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomHacienda Cemetary, a really great place for the dead... and the nearly dead.

properties.name: Fun in the Cemetary
properties.description: Posted by Amyflotsom Dead cats, dark clothes, sex between gravestones... Saturday night. Avoiding the cops was the hardest part.

properties.name: Going Very Fast
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomThe 5 freeway going to LA is barren an ugly and very straight. It all lends itself to exceeding the speed limit excessively.

properties.name: Going even faster
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomThe speed limit is around 80 here, so of course, we had to see if we could exceed 100. We did.

properties.name: Great under the stars sex
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomIt was in high school, we were camping out, and we went hiking. Some of us went back, me and a guy stayed behind for a while.

properties.name: Hot Springs
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomBig signs everywhere warning you that the water can suddenly get very hot (boiling). Other than that, a very lovely place to frolic. We froliced and took pictures of a semi-nude goth girl (me) in the water with steam all around.

properties.name: Lost
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomI got lost here once, as a small child. It was only for a few minutes, but traumatized me. To this day I am afraid of puffer fish.

properties.name: Loud Dancing
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomThe Tao Beach Club, a nightclub at the Venetian. Loud simple music with a good beat that just vibrates at night. Pillars of fire light the area. Next to a pool which I fell in to. Great times.

properties.name: My first real coaster
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomOrland was great, I was still a kid and I loved Universal better than Disney World. My parents had to coax me on to this hulk coaster, I cried all the way but when it was done I wanted to go again... and again...

properties.name: Party House
properties.description: Posted by Amyflotsom Not sure if this is the place, but a friend in high school\'s dad was remodeling a house in PV, and she had a key... we would get someone to drive us up there at night was it was the perfect place to party. Isolated, quiet, private. It only lasted thee months but it was cool.

properties.name: Stealing an Apple
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomSo I got kicked out of Disneyland for trying to steal the apple from the witch\'s hand in the snow white ride. Turns out they have a camera on it and someone is watching most of the time. They get really upset. So why is it on my Good Places list? Cause Disneyland is still rad, I have a friend that works there, and Bat Day at D-Land is the best!

properties.name: The Mall
properties.description: Posted by Amyflotsom Not really a Good Place per se, but I sure spent enough time here with friends harassing straight people with the simple sight of us and behaving in an unseemly manner. It was fun.

properties.name: Ye Olde Insane Asylum
properties.description: Posted by AmyflotsomYou can see it if you know how.
